pageContext.claim: “It's a big movement now because of the Super Bowl, if you can believe this. They are bringing in a lot of women through the southern border for the Super Bowl.”
pageContext.analysis: There is virtually no evidence of increased "sex trafficking" because of the Super Bowl, let alone that people are coming across the southern border as Trump says. As The Fact Checker has documented, this is a myth promoted by the media and politicians.
